mapper.select: SELECT * FROM v_fbolist WHERE st_id = #{st_id} and fbo_hashtag like '%' || #{fbo_hashtag} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fboard( fbo_no, fbo_title, fbo_subject, fbo_time, fbo_content, fbo_hashtag, st_id, mem_id, fbo_views ) VALUES( bo_seq.NEXTVAL, #{fbo_title}, #{fbo_subject}, SYSDATE, #{fbo_content}, #{fbo_hashtag}, #{st_id}, #{mem_id}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE fboard SET fbo_subject = #{fbo_subject}, fbo_title = #{fbo_title}, fbo_content = #{fbo_content}, fbo_hashtag = #{fbo_hashtag} WHERE fbo_no = #{fbo_no}
